abstract: Nelson Peltz’s firm nominates four director candidates to the board of DuPont. | Encore Capital faces a fine and the loss of thousands of court judgments. | Voices join Greek left’s call for a new deal on debt. | Santander plans a capital increase.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Proxy Fight at DuPont
